author: cutting
msg: Fix for NUTCH-209.  Nutch now supplies all code to remote MapReduce daemons through a job jar file.  So Hadoop daemons no longer need to be restarted when Nutch code changes.

author: wrowe
msg: Avoid a hang if apr_accept() fails, permitting APR_EINPROGRESS

msg: Testcase to reproduce bug 31878, incomplete partial root on UFS

author: wrowe
msg: getcwd() isn't portable.  We can 'exercise' more apr_functions
